name: scout
description: This guy combines a great advantage with a bitter weakness. While the TF2 Scout moves super fast, his health is very low.

name: Soldier
description: Twith his rockets, the TF2 Soldier causes significant damage and allows teammates to take some territory under their control. He has a big storage of health and can play well, even in defense. He is the TF2 best class for beginners

name: Pyro
description: The attacking style of this TF2 character is not so straightforward as the Soldier. The Pyro is the most effective in a short range, so he can be used to sneak into the area of enemies to burn them down.
